title: Configure Problem Management
content:
Service Management offers complete out-of-the-box configuration that complies with ITIL version 3. You can change the out-of-the-box configuration to meet the business objectives of your organization.

You can customize:

  • Groups
  • Categories
  • Notifications
  • Fields
  • Forms
  • Lists
  • Studio
  • Problem templates
  • Processes and Rules
